Event.EventName: As you enter the market you notice a kindly looking old lady looking around for a hand, as you approach she says 'Oh hello deary, I wonder if you could do me a favour and donate this antiseptic to the hospital for me. I'd do it myself but elderly people such as myself are more at risk to the infection'

EventOption.EventOptionPostDescription: She looks ever so greateful and passes you the antiseptic to deliver

EventOption.EventOptionDescription: You apologise to the old lady but you just don't have the time
EventOption.EventOptionPostDescription: She looks dissapointed but says farewel in a friendly enough tone that you don't think too much of it
